name: MagicMix
description:
Made for the GamePlusJam 2022

Go out in the forest and collect as much MIX as you can!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Space to use power-up

How to Play:

Shooting enemies won't work when they're by themselves. Shoot them when they are overlapping another to mix them!

There's a random chance that an enemy might drop a power-up. Press SPACE to use it.

Power-ups include:

  • Speed (Speeds up for 5 seconds)
  • Teleport (Teleports you back to spawn)
  • Trap (Trap enemies to combine them)

Credits:

Programming: Nico (me)

Art: Specter (@Spectfield)

Music Used
